column4: Hi, i would like to try Ubuntu with WUBI, i downloaded the file, but if I start it after some seconds the file vanishes from taskmanager and nothing happens
you have the wubi download .exe the latest?
Wubi does not run from the ISO has not for some time
The .exe should download the OS, not sure but having the ISO there may be causing a problem here is the wubi wiki. Please use nicks in the channel. https://wiki.ubuntu.com/WubiGuide
